item.title: Give schemacrawler a go!
item.description: Few months ago, I was looking for a way to check the evolution of the structure of one SQLite database I am working on, so I thought having a simple way to get a schema of my database would be a simple solution. A colleague of mine suggested to give SchemaCrawler a try, and so I gave it a go. I quickly realized that the easiest way to use it on my Debian machine was to use the Docker image, and so I did
